svg.title: digital signatures comprehensive
svg.text: 📝 Definition: Digital signatures are cryptographic mechanisms that verify authenticity, integrity, and non-repudiation of digital documents
🔐 Technology: Uses asymmetric cryptography - private key for signing, public key for verification
⚖️ Legal Value: Legally recognized in many jurisdictions as equivalent to handwritten signatures
🛡️ Security: Provides strong cryptographic evidence of document origin and prevents tampering detection
